description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Rock Blocks is a unique puzzle game that challenges you and friends to destroy falling Rocks using your XBOX guitar or game controller. Build towers of Blocks and destroy them with same colored Rocks. Use your strategy to create insane high scores by building massive multipliers and working powerful hidden combos! Play at your own speed! Includes Speed Play mode and Endless Play for all ages.
